# AI Image Generation - Arcane Style

## Project Overview

This Next.js app allows users to upload an image and transform it into an Arcane-style illustration using AI. The generated image is merged with a fixed background and can be previewed, downloaded, or shared.

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Canvas API for image merging
- AI Image Generation API (OpenAI DALL-E or similar)

## Development Notes

- Use server actions or API routes for AI processing
- Implement client-side canvas for image preview and merging
- Store uploaded images temporarily for processing
- Generate final PNG with transparent background merging
